ni urrais in baurim qinono maiza Iohanne þamma daupjandin;
iþ sa minniza in þiudangardjai himine maiza imma ist.
MATT 11.12 framuh þan þaim dagam Iohannis þis daupjandins und hita þiudangardi himine anamahtjada, jah anamahtjandans frawilwand þo.
MATT 11.13 allai auk praufeteis jah witoþ und Iohanne fauraqeþun;
MATT 11.14 jah jabai wildedeiþ miþniman, sa ist Helias, saei skulda qiman.
MATT 11.15 saei habai ausona hausjandona, gahausjai.
MATT 11.16 ƕe nu galeiko þata kuni?
Galeik ist barnam sitandam in garunsim jah wopjandam anþar anþaris, MATT 11.17 jah qiþandam:
MATT 11.18 qam raihtis Iohannes nih matjands nih drigkands jah qiþand:
MATT 11.19 qam sa sunus mans matjands jah drigkands jah qiþand:
sai, manna afetja jah afdrugkja, motarje frijonds jah frawaurhtaize.
jah uswaurhta gadomida warþ handugei fram barnam seinaim.
MATT 11.20 þanuh dugann idweitjan baurgim, in þaimei waurþun þos managistons mahteis is, þatei ni idreigodedun sik.
MATT 11.21 wai þus Kaurazein, wai þus Beþsaïdan;
unte iþ waurþeina in Twre jah Seidone landa mahteis þos waurþanons in izwis, airis þau in sakkau jah azgon idreigodedeina.
Twrim jah Seidonim sutizo wairþiþ in daga stauos þau izwis.
MATT 11.23 jah þu Kafarnaum, þu und himin ushauhida, dalaþ und halja galeiþis:
unte jabai in Saudaumjam waurþeina mahteis þos waurþanons in izwis, aiþþau eis weseina und hina dag.
MATT 11.24 sweþauh qiþa izwis þatei airþai Saudaumje sutizo wairþiþ in daga stauos þau þus.
MATT 25.38 ƕanuh þan þuk seƕum gast jah galaþodedum?
MATT 25.39 ƕanuh þan þuk seƕum siukana aiþþau in karkarai jah atiddjedum du þus?
MATT 25.40 jah andhafjands sa þiudans qiþiþ du im:
jah þanei tawideduþ ainamma þize minnistane broþre meinaize, mis tawideduþ.
MATT 25.41 þanuh qiþiþ jah þaim af hleidumein ferai:
gaggiþ fairra mis, jus fraqiþanans, in fon þata aiweino, þata manwido unhulþin jah aggilum is.
MATT 25.42 unte gredags was janni gebuþ mis matjan;
MATT 25.43 gasts was janni galaþodeduþ mik;
siuks jah in karkarai janni gaweisodeduþ meina.
MATT 25.44 þanuh andhafjand jah þai qiþandans:
frauja, ƕan þuk seƕum gredagana aiþþau afþaursidana aiþþau gast aiþþau naqadana aiþþau siukana aiþþau in karkarai janni andbahtidedeima þus?
jah þanei ni tawideduþ ainamma þize leitilane, mis ni tawideduþ.
MATT 25.46 jah galeiþand þai in balwein aiweinon, iþ þai garaihtans in libain aiweinon.
MATT 26.1 Jah warþ, biþe ustauh Iesus alla þo waurda, qaþ siponjam seinaim:
MATT 26.2 wituþ þatei afar twans dagans paska wairþiþ, jassa sunus mans atgibada du ushramjan.
sai, nu gahausideduþ þo wajamerein is.
MATT 26.67 þanuh spiwun ana andawleizn is jah kaupastedun ina;
Xristu, ƕas ist sa slahands þuk?
MATT 26.69 iþ Paitrus uta sat ana rohsnai, jah duatiddja imma aina þiwi qiþandei:
jah þu wast miþ Iesua þamma Galeilaiau.
MATT 26.71 usgaggandan þan ina in daur, gasaƕ ina anþara jah qaþ du þaim jainar:
